mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS = 1 AND LINE_ORDER = CURR_ORDER AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_USER , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , CURR_ORDER , LINE_ORDER , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , USER_NO , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS = 1 AND LINE_ORDER = CURR_ORDER AND USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CURR_ORDER , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND L.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CURR_ORDER < LINE_ORDER
SELECT APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_DATE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , UPDATE_USER FROM T_APPROVAL WHERE APPR_USER = #{apprUser}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(2,3)
SELECT REF_NO , R.APPR_NO , USER_NO , REF_TYPE , READ_YN , READ_DATE FROM T_APPR_REF R JOIN T_APPROVAL A ON R.APPR_NO = A.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(0,1)

SELECT A.APPR_NO AS APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO as USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(2,3) AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CURR_ORDER , LINE_NO , L.USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE APPR_STATUS IN(0,1) AND L.USER_NO = 'B0013' AND CURR_ORDER < LINE_ORDER AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}
SELECT APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_DATE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , UPDATE_USER FROM T_APPROVAL WHERE APPR_USER = #{apprUser} AND APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT A.APPR_NO as APPR_NO , APPR_USER , DEPT_NO , APPR_TYPE , APPR_DATE , APPR_TITLE , APPR_CONTENT , APPR_STATUS , LINE_NO , USER_NO , LINE_ORDER , LINE_STATUS , LINE_DATE , LINE_REASON FROM T_APPROVAL A LEFT JOIN T_APPR_LINE L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND APPR_STATUS IN(2,3) AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}
